description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up

description:
Motorists will "inevitably" end up paying per mile to drive on Britain’s roads as the switch to electric cars reduces fuel taxes, the Government’s infrastructure tsar has said.

The post Pay-Per-Mile Road Pricing is “Inevitable”, Drivers Warned appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Pay-Per-Mile Road Pricing is “Inevitable”, Drivers Warned

description:
A state-funded 'anti-hate' organisation run by an Islamic scholar has become Germany's first official internet censor, empowered under the Digital Services Act to all but compel websites to delete the 'fake news' it flags.

The post State-Funded ‘Anti-Hate’ Organisation Run by Islamic Scholar Becomes Germany’s First Official Internet Censor appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: State-Funded ‘Anti-Hate’ Organisation Run by Islamic Scholar Becomes Germany’s First Official Internet Censor

description:
The U.K. only avoided a blackout on Tuesday because gas came to the rescue after a power line importing electricity from Norway failed. Under Net Zero we won't have gas to save us, warns Paul Homewood.

The post Gas Power Prevented Blackout on Tuesday appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Gas Power Prevented Blackout on Tuesday

description:
The BBC Weather app incorrectly forecast winds of 15,000mph in Oxford Circus and temperatures of 404°C in Nottingham amid a countrywide software failure.

The post BBC Weather App Predicts 15,000mph Winds in Oxford Circus and 404°C Temperatures appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: BBC Weather App Predicts 15,000mph Winds in Oxford Circus and 404°C Temperatures

description:
The calls from the public health establishment to forget what happened during Covid and move on are growing louder, spurred by the prospect of RFK Jr. being appointed by Trump. But we will not forget, says Thomas Buckley.

The post No, We Will Never Forget What You Did to Us in Covid appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No, We Will Never Forget What You Did to Us in Covid

description:
The fount of green propaganda continues to flow, with two new reports from the Green Alliance purporting to link health problems and climate change. Ben Pile reads them so you don't have to and highlights the worst bits.

The post Debunking the Latest Climate Change Reports From the Green Alliance appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Debunking the Latest Climate Change Reports From the Green Alliance

description:
In Episode 17 of the Sceptic: Brendan O'Neill on the October 7th anniversary, Jess Gill on how mass immigration made London unsafe and Ralph Schoellhammer on the Austrian Freedom Party's election win.

The post In Episode 17 of the Sceptic: Brendan O’Neill on the Oct 7th Anniversary, Jess Gill on How Mass Immigration Made London Unsafe and Ralph Schoellhammer on the Austrian Freedom Party’s Election Win appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: In Episode 17 of the Sceptic: Brendan O’Neill on the Oct 7th Anniversary, Jess Gill on How Mass Immigration Made London Unsafe and Ralph Schoellhammer on the Austrian Freedom Party’s Election Win
